flawed_nl_solution:
He read 600/40=<<600/40=15>>15 hours per week
So now he reads 15-4=<<15-4=15>>15 hours per week
She now reads 40*1.5=<<40*1.5=60>>60 pages per hour
So she reads 15*60=<<15*60=900>>900 pages per week

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11, not 15. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
